author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Amanda Peet Joins ‘Your Friends And Neighbors’ Apple Series, Craig Gillespie To Direct
text:
Summary by Ground News Amanda Peet is set as a lead opposite Jon Hamm in Your Friends and Neighbors. Craig Gillespie is set to direct the first two episodes and executive produce. Peet headlined Season 2 of USA Network’s crime anthology series Dirty John. Her series credits also include Brockmire, Togetherness and Fatal Attraction. Craig Gillespie (Physical) is set to direct the first two episodes and executive produce. Based on an original idea by Tropper, Your Friends and Neighbors stars Hamm as Coop, […]
